üéµ Welcome to Acme Music Mayhem! üéµ

Congratulations! You've discovered the premium Acme Corporation Music Experience‚Ñ¢ - now with 47% more explosions than our competitors!

How to Use Your Acme QR Cards:

  1. Step 1: Point your camera at the QR code (Warning: Do not eat the QR code)
  2. Step 2: Wait for the music to start (Patience is a virtue, impatience is also acceptable)
  3. Step 3: Dance like nobody's watching (Spoiler: The Acme surveillance team is ALWAYS watching üëÄ)
  4. Step 4: Try to guess the song before your friends (Cheating is encouraged, but frowned upon)
  5. Step 5: Repeat until your neighbors complain or the police arrive

üé∏ Pro Tip: Our Acme QR cards are also excellent coasters for your beverages! Just don't blame us when your drink starts playing music.

‚ö†Ô∏è Warning:

Side effects may include: uncontrollable toe-tapping, spontaneous air guitar solos, and an overwhelming urge to karaoke at 3 AM.

Remember: At Acme Corporation, we don't just deliver products - we deliver experiences. Mostly safe ones. Probably.

Acme Corporation is not responsible for earworms, dance-related injuries, or marriages ruined by terrible music taste.
